name: CrazyCargo!
description:
Combine in this all-new game concept by skill, vision and quickness different colored cargos to "winning lines". The increasing severity ensures long-lasting fun.

The most challenging puzzle game ever!

Crazy Cargo is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!



Help the Cargo Guy with his exciting challenge!

Jump into the fray on your own or play with friends to see who achieves the highest score!



Crazy Cargo is characterized by:

Detailed obsessed graphics, for unlimited fun
Simple rules, for entertainment from the first minute
Sophisticated "ONE TOUCH" control perfectly for iOS
Highscores for you and your friends



We want to thank all players of Crazy Cargo!

Are you already a fan of Crazy Cargo? Stay up to date with a "Like" on Facebook.

http://facebook.com/CrazyCargo
